remarks: The value of the algorithm iterator ` R ` at ` 0 ` is the initial state ` A ` .  (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 31-Mar-2011.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2014.)
statement:
algrf.1 $e |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) $.
algrf.2 $e |- R = seq M ( ( F o. 1st ) , ( Z X. { A } ) ) $.
algrf.3 $e |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) $.
algrf.4 $e |- ( ph -> A e. S ) $.
algr0 $p |- ( ph -> ( R ` M ) = A ) $.
